class.name: Phaser.AnimationManager

parameters.name: sprite
parameters.help: A reference to the Game Object that owns this AnimationManager.

class.help: The Animation Manager is used to add, play and update Phaser Animations.\nAny Game Object such as Phaser.Sprite that supports animation contains a single AnimationManager instance.

public.name: add

returns.help: The Animation object that was created.

public.help: Adds a new animation under the given key. Optionally set the frames, frame rate and loop.\nAnimations added in this way are played back with the play function.

parameters.name: name
parameters.help: The unique (within this Sprite) name for the animation, i.e. "run", "fire", "walk".

parameters.name: frames
parameters.help: An array of numbers/strings that correspond to the frames to add to this animation and in which order. e.g. [1, 2, 3] or ['run0', 'run1', run2]). If null then all frames will be used.

parameters.name: frameRate
parameters.help: The speed at which the animation should play. The speed is given in frames per second.

parameters.name: loop
parameters.help: Whether or not the animation is looped or just plays once.

parameters.name: useNumericIndex
parameters.help: Are the given frames using numeric indexes (default) or strings?

public.name: destroy
public.help: Destroys all references this AnimationManager contains.\nIterates through the list of animations stored in this manager and calls destroy on each of them.

public.name: getAnimation

returns.help: The Animation instance, if found, otherwise null.

public.help: Returns an animation that was previously added by name.

parameters.name: name
parameters.help: The name of the animation to be returned, e.g. "fire".

public.name: next
public.help: Advances by the given number of frames in the current animation, taking the loop value into consideration.

parameters.name: quantity
parameters.help: The number of frames to advance.

public.name: play

returns.help: A reference to playing Animation instance.

public.help: Play an animation based on the given key. The animation should previously have been added via sprite.animations.add()\nIf the requested animation is already playing this request will be ignored. If you need to reset an already running animation do so directly on the Animation object itself.

parameters.name: name
parameters.help: The name of the animation to be played, e.g. "fire", "walk", "jump".

parameters.name: frameRate
parameters.help: The framerate to play the animation at. The speed is given in frames per second. If not provided the previously set frameRate of the Animation is used.

parameters.name: loop
parameters.help: Should the animation be looped after playback. If not provided the previously set loop value of the Animation is used.

parameters.name: killOnComplete
parameters.help: If set to true when the animation completes (only happens if loop=false) the parent Sprite will be killed.

public.name: previous
public.help: Moves backwards the given number of frames in the current animation, taking the loop value into consideration.

parameters.name: quantity
parameters.help: The number of frames to move back.

public.name: refreshFrame
public.help: Refreshes the current frame data back to the parent Sprite and also resets the texture data.

public.name: stop
public.help: Stop playback of an animation. If a name is given that specific animation is stopped, otherwise the current animation is stopped.\nThe currentAnim property of the AnimationManager is automatically set to the animation given.

parameters.name: name
parameters.help: The name of the animation to be stopped, e.g. "fire". If none is given the currently running animation is stopped.

parameters.name: resetFrame
parameters.help: When the animation is stopped should the currentFrame be set to the first frame of the animation (true) or paused on the last frame displayed (false)

public.name: validateFrames

returns.help: True if all given Frames are valid, otherwise false.

public.help: Check whether the frames in the given array are valid and exist.

parameters.name: frames
parameters.help: An array of frames to be validated.

parameters.name: useNumericIndex
parameters.help: Validate the frames based on their numeric index (true) or string index (false)

protected.name: update

returns.help: True if a new animation frame has been set, otherwise false.

protected.help: The main update function is called by the Sprites update loop. It's responsible for updating animation frames and firing related events.

private.name: copyFrameData

returns.help: Returns `true` if the frame data was loaded successfully, otherwise `false`

private.help: Loads FrameData into the internal temporary vars and resets the frame index to zero.\nThis is called automatically when a new Sprite is created.

parameters.name: frameData
parameters.help: The FrameData set to load.

parameters.name: frame
parameters.help: The frame to default to.

private.name: loadFrameData

returns.help: Returns `true` if the frame data was loaded successfully, otherwise `false`

private.help: Loads FrameData into the internal temporary vars and resets the frame index to zero.\nThis is called automatically when a new Sprite is created.

parameters.name: frameData
parameters.help: The FrameData set to load.

parameters.name: frame
parameters.help: The frame to default to.

public.name: currentAnim
public.inlineHelp: The currently displayed animation, if any.

public.name: currentFrame
public.inlineHelp: The currently displayed Frame of animation, if any.

public.name: frame
public.inlineHelp: Gets or sets the current frame index and updates the Texture Cache for display.

public.name: frameName
public.inlineHelp: Gets or sets the current frame name and updates the Texture Cache for display.

public.name: frameTotal
public.inlineHelp: The total number of frames in the currently loaded FrameData, or -1 if no FrameData is loaded.

public.name: game
public.inlineHelp: A reference to the currently running Game.

public.name: isLoaded
public.inlineHelp: Set to true once animation data has been loaded.

public.name: name
public.inlineHelp: Gets the current animation name, if set.

public.name: paused
public.inlineHelp: Gets and sets the paused state of the current animation.

public.name: sprite
public.inlineHelp: A reference to the parent Sprite that owns this AnimationManager.

public.name: updateIfVisible
public.inlineHelp: Should the animation data continue to update even if the Sprite.visible is set to false.

private.name: _anims
private.inlineHelp: An internal object that stores all of the Animation instances.

private.name: _frameData
private.inlineHelp: A temp. var for holding the currently playing Animations FrameData.

private.name: _outputFrames
private.inlineHelp: An internal object to help avoid gc.
